import sys

if __name__ == '__main__':
    A, B, C = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split())
    print(min(B // A, C))

n, m = map(int, input().split())
print(min(n // 2, m))

a, b, c = map(int, input().split()) 
print(min(b // a, c))
